qa_list.question: When was the Kiltie Band founded?
qa_list.answer: The Kiltie Band was founded in 1908 by a group of seven students dedicated to supporting Carnegie Tech football.

qa_list.question: What is the main purpose of the Kiltie Band according to their recruiting brochure?
qa_list.answer: The main purpose of the Kiltie Band, according to their recruiting brochure, is to wear kilts, act crazy, and have lots of fun with their instruments.

qa_list.question: What does the text say about the origin of the tradition of wearing kilts in the Kiltie Band?
qa_list.answer: The text doesn't provide information on how or why the tradition of wearing kilts started in the Kiltie Band.

qa_list.question: What is the name of the university where the Kiltie Band continues a tradition of excellence?
qa_list.answer: The Kiltie Band continues a tradition of excellence at Carnegie Mellon University.

doc_text: Welcome to the Official Home of the Band Without Pants! - 100 Years of Excellence The Usual Home Our Story Officers Former Presidents Rehearsal Schedule Attendance Policy Band Constitution Contact Us The Unusual Band Sections Kiltie Traditions The Kiltie Times Cheers & Lyrics Photos Music The Fun IM Sports Spring Carnival Basketball vs. Brandeis Friday, 1/12 5:30pm Wiegand Gym Basketball vs. NYU Sunday, 1/14 2:00pm Wiegand Gym Basketball vs. WashU Friday, 2/2 5:30pm Wiegand Gym Basketball vs. Chicago Sunday, 2/4 1:00pm Wiegand Gym Basketball vs. Rochester Friday, 2/16 5:30pm Wiegand Gym Basketball vs. NYU Sunday, 1/14 2:00pm Wiegand Gym Basketball vs. Emory Sunday, 2/18 2:00pm Wiegand Gym Don't You Hate Pants? Started in 1908 by a group of just seven students dedicated to supporting Carnegie Tech football, today's Kiltie Band continues a tradition of excellence originated over a century ago... At least that's what our recruiting brochure says. We wear kilts, act crazy, and have lots of fun with our instruments. Copyright © 2024 - Carnegie Mellon University Kiltie Band
